div.p: ONE WAY OR THE OTHER FINALLY TONIGHT, A NEW ONLINE POLL ABOUT
TIPPING IN RESTAURANTS IS VERY INSTRUCTIVE.
10% OF CUSTOMERS IN AMERICA NEVER TIP.
ONLY 20% GIVE MORE THAN 20%. THE RATIONALE BEING PEOPLE DON’T
HAVE MUCH MONEY THESE DAYS, THAT’S UNDERSTANDABLE.
HOWEVER, GENEROSITY WILL ALWAYS COME BACK TO YOU.
IF YOU GET GOOD SERVICE IN A RESTAURANT YOU SHOULD TIP
BETWEEN 15 AND 20%. EVEN MORE IF THEY WERE REALLY
GOOD. THAT’S SIMPLY THE RIGHT THING TO
DO. THE MORE GENEROUS YOU ARE, THE
MORE THINGS WILL BREAK YOUR WAY IN THE LONG RUN, IT’S A KARMA
THING. FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY.
THAT’S IT FOR US TONIGHT. PLEASE CHECK OUT THE FACTOR NEWS
